example.code:
PS C:\> Get-SSMPatchBaseline
BaselineDescription BaselineId BaselineName ------------------- ---------- ------------ Default Patch Baseline Provided by AWS. arn:aws:ssm:us-west-2:123456789012:patchbaseline/pb-04fb4ae6142167966 AWS-DefaultP... Baseline containing all updates approved for production systems pb-045f10b4f382baeda Production-B... Baseline containing all updates approved for production systems pb-0a2f1059b670ebd31 Production-B...
example.description: This example lists all patch baselines.
This example lists all patch baselines provided by AWS. The syntax used by this example requires PowerShell version 3 or later.
This example lists all patch baselines with you as the owner. The syntax used by this example requires PowerShell version 3 or later.

example.code:
PS C:\> $filter1 = New-Object Amazon.SimpleSystemsManagement.Model.PatchOrchestratorFilter PS C:\> $filter1.Key = "OWNER" PS C:\> $filter1.Values = "AWS"
PS C:\> Get-SSMPatchBaseline -Filter $filter1
BaselineDescription BaselineId BaselineName DefaultBaselin e ------------------- ---------- ------------ -------------- Default Patch Baseline Provided by AWS. arn:aws:ssm:us-west-2:123456789012:patchbaseline/pb-04fb4ae6142167966 AWS-DefaultPatchBaseline True
example.description: With PowerShell version 2, you must use New-Object to create each tag.
